title: Ro-Kyu-Bu! (Ro-Kyu-Bu ~ Fast Break!)
synopsis: Subaru Hasegawa has the ambition to become one of the best basketball superstars of all time. However, this comes to an apparent halt when his school's basketball team ceases activities for a year. Shocked by the news, he decides not to involve himself in basketball anymore.
characters: ['Minato, Tomoka', 'Hakamada, Hinata', 'Misawa, Maho', 'Kashii, Airi', 'Nagatsuka, Saki', 'Hasegawa, Subaru', 'Takamura, Mihoshi', 'Ogiyama, Aoi', 'Takenaka, Natsuhi', 'Mishouji, Tae']
